Address.label: Address
Address.value: 70 EAST LONG LAKE ROAD, BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Michigan, 48304, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Agree Realty Corporation operates as a fully integrated real estate investment trust primarily focused on the ownership, acquisition, development, and management of retail properties net leased to industry- leading tenants. Some of its properties in the portfolio include 24 Hour Fitness, 7-Eleven, Wawa, PetSmart, among others.
